lead_paragraph: With the president in Orlando, family members of those killed in earlier gun tragedies recall a leader who related to them as an emotional father.

headline.print_headline: Relatives of the Victims Feel Obama’s Concern in Embrace-Filled Visit
headline.main: ‘Long and Genuine’ Hugs: Shooting Victims’ Relatives Recall Obama’s Empathy

snippet: With the president in Orlando, family members of those killed in earlier gun tragedies recall a leader who related to them as an emotional father.
abstract: Pres Obama visits Orlando, Fla, to offer embraces and words of condolence to friends and relatives of victims of America's deadliest mass shooting; Obama, making 15th such visit to a stricken community, has become practiced at somber ritual but maintains ability to dispense with trappings of his office and commune with mourners.
